comment: @Miloisawsome Oh I understood that ^^ I was just putting examples of some reasons that the Izuku's haters use-

author: Miloisawsome
comment: @ophelia_L I don't hate Deku btw ;-;

author: ophelia_L
comment: And I really appreciate you for not making Izuku looks overrated in your comment ^^ Since he's not, he deserves everything he has. He worked hard for it. I don't know why some people are starting to hate on Izuku (well, yes I do- but they are really childish, like: he's a cry baby! *I assume that you never cried before then?* He's weak! *Not as much as you.* He's ugly. *At least he's not in the inside.* ) It never ends- and I just- can't understand-

author: ophelia_L
comment: Bakugo has anger issues, which he can't control, I don't think he's insecure. But in either of the ways, does it excuse him for bullying Izuku for years? No. Does it excuse him for telling him to die? No.  But does it explains why he did that? Yes. That's why I think people should try to appreciate him not for his past (which would be just disgusting because, I have to admit it there, he was an a$$hole) but for his future, because he has a real character development. Because he's not perfect, he's not Izuku's best friend, he's Bakugo. And that's already a lot.  I made this just to say I'm agreeing with you- I-
